name: Darn Tough Light Hiker Light Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Unisex
categories: Light Hiker Light Cushion Micro Crew Socks
description: Lightly cushioned socks made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that stands up to multi-day backpacking trips.Made of merino wool, nylon, and Lycra.Lightly cushioned sole provide great comfort without bulk.Lightweight wool yarn in a ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
